author: Ubisoft
description:
New Mauve Sunset Materials are now available! Show off your shiny new colors to your opponents!

About For Honor:
Carve a path of destruction through the battlefield fighting for guts, glory, and survival in For Honor. Enter the chaos of a raging war as a Hero from some of the greatest warrior legacies ever known. For Honor is a fast-paced and immersive experience, mixing skill with visceral, never-before-seen melee combat.

Enjoy incredible seasonal content, engaging campaign and thrilling multiplayer with friends online, in split screen two-player co-op, or solo against AI.

#Ubisoft #ForHonor

About Ubisoft:
Ubisoft is a creator of worlds, committed to enriching players’ lives with original and memorable entertainment experiences. Ubisoft’s global teams create and develop a deep and diverse portfolio of games, featuring brands such as Assassin’s Creed®, Brawlhalla®, For Honor®, Far Cry®, Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon®, Just Dance®, Rabbids®, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six®, The Crew® and Tom
title: For Honor: Content Of The Week - 7 August

author: Ubisoft
description: Show off your shiny new colors to your opponents!
title: New Mauve Sunset Materials are now available!

author: Ubisoft
description:
Join the Deck for a livestream with the Skull and Bones dev team.
We’ll share some updates on what we have in progress, answer questions and maybe even share a few surprises.

Extend your experience with the Premium Edition here https://ubi.li/79ikz or by subscribing to Ubisoft+.

Play up to 6 hours for free and carry over your progression upon purchase of the game: https://www.skullandbonesgame.com/free-trial

And invite your friends to play Skull and Bones and earn rewards together! 
Learn more: https://skullandbonesgame.com/friend-referral
Find the Letter from the Producer here: 
https://skullandbonesgame.com/letter_from_producer_state

About Skull and Bones:
Enter the perilous world of Skull and BonesTM, where you play by your own rules to rise from a nobody to become the most fearsome pirate kingpin. Craft a variety of unique ships, forge unlikely alliances, and take part in thrilling naval battles as you overcome the odds and bring mayhem on the seas. Be part of an immersive wor
title: Skull and Bones: Community AMA - The Deck Devstream
